scripts.build:inspect:off: PARCEL_WORKERS=0 node --inspect-brk $(yarn bin atlaspack) build --no-cache --feature-flag conditionalBundlingApi=false src/index.html
scripts.build:inspect:on: PARCEL_WORKERS=0 node --inspect-brk $(yarn bin atlaspack) build --no-cache --feature-flag conditionalBundlingApi=true src/index.html
scripts.dev:off: npx nodemon -e 'ts, tsx, json, .parcelrc' --watch . --ignore 'dist/' --exec 'yarn build:off && node serve.js'
scripts.dev:on: npx nodemon -e 'ts, tsx, json, .parcelrc' --watch . --ignore 'dist/' --exec 'yarn build:on && node serve.js'
